channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The paradox of points

item.title: One Of The Best Netflix Shows Ever Made Is Back For Season 2 Today
item.description: 'Arcane' returns to Netflix for its second season, though it's divided into three parts releasing across the month of November.

item.title: Clear ice

item.title: 3 Species Facing Extinction And The Unique Reasons Why
item.description: Learn about three species facing extinction due to an alarming decline in their populations and the unique reasons for that decline.

item.title: The problem with the movie version

item.title: New ‘Dota 2’ Hero Kez Gets Rapid Buffs Thanks To Terrible Win Rate
item.description: Around 24 hours after launching, the newest Dota 2 hero, Kez, has been given some buffs due to having one of the worst win rates ever.

item.title: Kinds of power

item.title: Ample Urban Green Spaces Can Prevent Heat-Related Deaths And Illnesses
item.description: A recent study reported urban green spaces play a crucial role in lowering the rates of heat-related illnesses and deaths.
